title: Server refused to let me pick or ban
body: I was team captain, banned 2 champions. Could not ban the third time. Could not select a character. I would get "Retrieving data from server ..." until it timed out and canceled, but even then it wouldn't let me do anything. I lost LP because I couldn't pick a champion.

replies.body: This happens to me as well and is getting very annoying when it causes you to lose a series chance or a lot of LP. This needs a fix more than anything else at the moment.
I've been having this happen frequently as well, still no response.
I've had this happen so many times it drives me nuts. Everyone pretends to know nothing.
